name: Flappy Dragon (E-smile)
description:
Flappy Dragon

Flappy Dragon is a game created by CaptainVanessa, ManPaulu , and myself.

It was made as a group project in a one-day sprint with Pygame Zero.

I hope you will enjoy the result!

" Play as Flappy the dragon and fly over or under enemies in this cute fantasy side-scroller! " 

How to play?

Press S to start the game

Press space bar to jump

Press P to pause the game

Press R to restart the game

- We might update the game later on to spice things up -

_______________________________________________________________________________________
